item.title: Abandoned vehicles, 30th December
item.description:
Two vehicles have been positioned adjacent to the A40 Elmbridge Court roundabout and have remained in the same location for several months. Vegetation has grown around the vehicles, indicating they have not been moved for a significant period. The vehicles appear to have been deliberately placed at this location for the primary purpose of advertising. No formal consent or authorisation for advertising at this site appears to exist. This constitutes an unauthorised use of the public highway and a potential road safety concern at a busy junction. If left unaddressed, it risks setting a precedent for further unauthorised advertising on the highway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court, Churchdown, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
